channel.title: docker-compose on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in docker-compose on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Docker Compose安装
item.description: docker-compose安装步骤 1.下载 url: https://github.com/docker/compose/releases 备用地址：192.168.1.9:8080/share.cgi?ssid=05dGVzz 2.上传 sudo mv docker-compose-Linux-x86_64 /usr/local/bin/docker-compose 3.安装 sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/docker-compose
